text.title: Suicide bombing in Afghanistan kills six US NATO members
text.head: Suicide bombing in Afghanistan kills six US NATO members
Sister links
Sources

list.item: Barbara Goldberg. "Identities revealed for all six U.S. troops killed in Afghanistan attack" — Reuters , December 23, 2015
Tim Nudd. "NYPD Detective Is Among 6 Americans Killed in Afghanistan Suicide Bombing: 'We Will Miss Him Very Much'" — People (magazine) , December 22, 2015
Sunnivie Brydum. "BREAKING: Lesbian Air Force Major, DADT Repeal Advocate Killed in Action" — The Advocate , December 22, 2015
"Rio Grande Valley Service Member Killed in Afghanistan" — KRGV-TV , December 22, 2015
Andrea Cavallier. "Second airman among 6 killed in Afghanistan bombing identified as Long Island man" — WPIX-TV , December 22, 2015
Masoud Popalzai and Barbara Starr. "6 U.S. troops killed in motorcycle bomb attack in Afghanistan, officials say" — CNN , December 21, 2015
Dan Lamothe and Pamela Constable. "Six U.S. troops dead, others wounded in apparent suicide attack in Afghanistan" — The Washington Post , December 21, 2015
Lynne O'Donnell. "US troops killed near Bagram, Taliban insurgency intensifies" — Associated Press , December 21, 2015
